TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LegendCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 表示图例项中的图例单元。

span.span: Represents a legend cell in a legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图例填入图例项，由表示。A legend is populated with legend items, which are represented by the . 这些图例项包含单个图例单元格，又由。These legend items consist of individual legend cells, which are in turn represented by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于对齐文本、 序列符号或图例单元格内的映像。The property is used to align text, series symbols or images within the legend cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the legend cell.

value.span: 用于绘制图例单元背景的 值。

span.span: A value used to draw the legend cell's background.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在图例中设置的任何实体的背景色时具有最高优先级。The property has the highest priority when setting the background color of any entity in the legend.

public: virtual property int CellSpan { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于绘制图例单元内容的水平单元数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of horizontal cells used to draw the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示用于绘制图例单元内容的水平单元数。

span.span: An value that represents the number of horizontal cells used to draw the legend cell contents.

value.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果单元格内容必须超出的单元格宽度，则可以设置属性设置为适应内容所需的单元格的数目。If the cell contents must extend beyond the cell width, you can set the property to the number of cells required to fit the contents. 如果你想要添加扩展的标头或向图例的标题，最常使用此属性。This property is most often used if you wish to add an extended header or title to the legend. 当此属性设置为一个值大于 1 时，必须添加空图例单元格，以适应扩展的图例单元格的内容。When this property is set to a value larger than 1, empty legend cells must be added in order to accommodate the contents of the extended legend cell.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType CellType { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType CellType
Public Overridable Property CellType As LegendCellType

public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendCellType CellType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendCellType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendCellType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于定义图例单元的内容的图例单元类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the legend cell type that is used to define the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值表示用于定义图例单元内容的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the type that is used to define the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定将在每个单个图例单元中显示的内容的类型。The property determines the type of content that will be displayed in each individual legend cell. 必须指定以下的单元格类型之一：One of the following cell types must be specified: - 文本： 指定了字符串使用属性，并将显示在图例单元格。Text: A string is specified using the property, and will be displayed in the legend cell. - SeriesSymbol: 序列符号由中的属性类。SeriesSymbol: A series symbol is defined by the property in the class. 它将会显示图例单元格。It will be displayed for the legend cell. 回想一下序列符号是一个可视指示器-线条、 矩形或标记。Recall that a series symbol is a visual indicator—a line, rectangle or marker. 当设置为，自定义项的所有标记特性都应用到的单元格。When is set to , all marker attributes of the custom item apply to the cell. - 映像： 一个映像使用定义属性并且将会出现在图例单元格。Image: An image is defined using the property and will be displayed in the legend cell.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the font for the legend cell.

value.span: 获取一个 对象，表示图例单元的字体。

span.span: A object that represents the font for the legend cell.

value.span: 默认值为“Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt”。

span.span: The default value is "Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以用于设置图例单元格字体属性。The property can be used to set font properties of the legend cell. 如果你尝试更改此属性对象在运行时，将产生编译错误。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在运行时设置字体属性，你必须创建一个新对象。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来显式设置宽度和高度图例单元图像。The property is used to explicitly set the width and height of the legend cell image. 此属性才适用如果属性设置为。This property is only applicable if the property is set to .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的边距。

span.span: Gets or sets the margins of the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示图例单元格边距的顶部、底部、左侧和右侧值。

span.span: A object that represents the top, bottom, left, and right values of the legend cell margins.

value.span: 顶部、底部、左侧和右侧的默认值为“0,0,15,15”。

span.span: The default values for top, bottom, left and right are "0,0,15,15".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 边距测量图例单元格的字体大小的百分比。Margins are measured as a percentage of the font size for the legend cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的名称。

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例单元的文本名称。

span.span: A value that represents the text name of the legend cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图例单元的名称必须是唯一的;否则将引发异常。The name of the legend cell must be unique; otherwise an exception will be thrown. 属性可以用作索引器检索时对象。The property can be used as the indexer when retrieving a object from the . 如果将此属性设置为零长度字符串，则将引发异常。If you set this property to a zero-length string, an exception will be thrown.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元中显示的序列符号的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the series symbol that is displayed in the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示序列符号的大小。

span.span: A object that represents the size of the series symbol.

value.span: 符号宽度和高度的默认值分别为 200 和 70。

span.span: The default values for the width and height of the symbol are 200 and 70, respectively.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列符号大小被以图例字号的百分比。The size of the series symbol is measured as a percentage of the legend font size. 属性才适用如果属性设置为。The property is only applicable if the property is set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ToolTip { get; set; }
.property instance string ToolTip
Public Overridable Property ToolTip As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ToolTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip text for the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例单元的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip for the legend cell.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ToolTip`属性设置为图例项和图例单元格，则图例单元属性的优先级。If the `ToolTip` property is set for both a legend item and a legend cell, the legend cell property has precedence. 这属性可以设置要显示不同类型的与图表相关的数据的特殊关键字。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data.
